name: Fish Gunner
description:
Fish Gunner is a Tower-Defense-Game made for the MEGA Hackathon 2022. It adresses UN-Goal 14: 'Life Below Water'. 

Units:
Piranha: Basic fish, can attack within a certain range
Jellyfish: AOE-attacks within a certain range
Sea-Cucumber: Supports surrounding allies
Shark: Stronger version of the Piranha

Controls:
1-4, then left-click to buy a unit
right-click to cancel buying a unit
